tool_description: Generate custom radar plots (spider charts) on-the-fly with our API. Input your data and get a downloadable chart image instantly.
name: Radar Chart
title: Radar Chart

api_list.name: GCF
api_list.description: This Endpoint takes data points and generates a Radar Chart as an output.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://radar-chart.p.rapidapi.com/vv90-cfs1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radar-chart.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://radar-chart.p.rapidapi.com/vv90-cfs1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radar-chart.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
